name: Tank (itch) (TheClockworks)
description:
A clone of Atari Tank, but with a small adjustment. Made to help familiarize myself with Construct 3. Avoid mines and fire at the opposing tank to score points. Whoever has the most points when time runs out is the winner!

Player 1 Controls:

w - Move forwards - Move backwarda - Rotate leftd - Rotate righte - Fire cannonr - Lay mine

Player 2 Controls:

Up Arrow - Move forwardDown Arrow - Move backwardLeft Arrow - Rotate leftRight Arrow - Rotate rightPeriod - Fire cannonComma - Lay mine
